previous.excerpt: Sizey is a MacOS app that helps you calculate aspect ratios! ⠀ — ⠀ ⚡️ Add Custom Aspect Ratios ⠀ 💥 Round to the nearest whole # ⠀ ➡️ Keyboard Shortcuts ⠀ 📐 Scale & Densities (@1x, @2x, @3x) ⠀ 🙌 Landscape & Portrait modes — ⠀ You design. We’ll math. ❤️📐
previous.title: Sizey: Aspect Ratio Calculator - Instantly calculate any aspect ratio.

localize.description: Sizey是一款MacOS应用程序，可以帮助您计算纵横比！⠀-⠀⚡️添加自定义纵横比⠀💥舍入到最接近的整数#⠀➡️键盘快捷键⠀📐比例和密度(@1x，@2x，@3x)⠀🙌横向和纵向模式-您设计的⠀。我们要学数学。❤️📐
Sizey是一款MacOS應用程序，可以幫助您計算縱橫比！⠀-⠀⚡️添加自定義縱橫比⠀💥舍入到最接近的整數#⠀➡️鍵盤快捷鍵⠀📐比例和密度(@1x，@2x，@3x)⠀🙌橫向和縱向模式-您設計的⠀。我們要學數學。❤️📐
